<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit the stack frame size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ad87d51ae3e480de2e3892fc257406212">emitInt16</a>(MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#a681b6af2f54c7606da87aa7e777bbe3e">getFrameSize</a>() / IntPtrSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit stack arity, i.e. the number of stacked arguments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RegisteredArgs = IntPtrSize == 4 ? 5 : 6;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StackArity = MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#ad698a1f47410fdd4aeaa489f3d865019">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#ac6baa801e4aea800984e760d5460662f">arg&#95;size</a>() &gt; RegisteredArgs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">                              ? MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#ad698a1f47410fdd4aeaa489f3d865019">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#ac6baa801e4aea800984e760d5460662f">arg&#95;size</a>() - RegisteredArgs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">                              : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a64eafd6bed9f342e423e74a93223135c">AddComment</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;stack arity&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ad87d51ae3e480de2e3892fc257406212">emitInt16</a>(StackArity);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit the number of live roots in the function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a64eafd6bed9f342e423e74a93223135c">AddComment</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;live root count&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ad87d51ae3e480de2e3892fc257406212">emitInt16</a>(MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#a61aea3cbd5619f46ce9aa2ce3799ff9d">live&#95;size</a>(PI));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// And for each live root...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#aa9282de572d03dca73f282b617f64bd0">GCFunctionInfo::live&#95;iterator</a> LI = MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#a81c7cd06eff3dc773acdbcdf7f654879">live&#95;begin</a>(PI),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       LE = MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#a9da823485016de1037a37cc2f66739c9">live&#95;end</a>(PI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">         LI != LE; ++LI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit live root&#39;s offset within the stack frame.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a64eafd6bed9f342e423e74a93223135c">AddComment</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;stack index (offset / wordsize)&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">      AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ad87d51ae3e480de2e3892fc257406212">emitInt16</a>(LI-&gt;StackOffset / IntPtrSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
